formattedAddress: 995 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 995 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025-2264, USA

editorialSummary.text: Local bar popular among collegiate types for its daily food & drink specials such as dollar beers.

originalText.text: Good bar with a good set of quality drafts served by attentive bartenders. There is good seating indoors and outdoors. We only ordered drinks during happy hour. The bartenders are not good about mentioning that only certain drinks qualify for their happy hour special, so that was a little annoying to find out when we got the bill. Granted, we could have asked...but didn't, thought the sign outside mentioning the discount on drafts applied to all the beers, so our experience was tainted by that.

text.text: Good bar with a good set of quality drafts served by attentive bartenders. There is good seating indoors and outdoors. We only ordered drinks during happy hour. The bartenders are not good about mentioning that only certain drinks qualify for their happy hour special, so that was a little annoying to find out when we got the bill. Granted, we could have asked...but didn't, thought the sign outside mentioning the discount on drafts applied to all the beers, so our experience was tainted by that.

originalText.text: I have been a regular at LH for over 20 years. Cool place to hang out in, nice atmosphere. The food is pretty good. My favorites are the wings and the nachos. The reason I'm giving it 3 stars is a few reasons. For one, in all the years that I've been coming here, it does not seem like one renovation or update has been made. The kitchen is teeny tiny. I don't know how they manage to work in that kitchen. The two bathrooms I'm sorry to say are really nasty. Not kept up with and dirty. The place obviously makes money, the owner Jay should really invest in doing some renovations. I understand it's a 'dive' bar, but I've been to dive bars that are clean and their bathrooms are spotless. There's a lot of room for improvement there. Also,  lately, they never have a good beer selection. I'm not sure what's going on, but they are very limited with beer selections which is not good. Other than that, the bartenders are super nice, the owner's wife is so sweet and always moving around doing something. She's great. A few updates/renovations and this place would get 5 stars from me.

originalText.text: The food is good for late night drinking Especially the wings and veggie Nachos also the kitchen is open late. Drinks are okay depending who’s pouring & price will vary depending on the bartender also which is weird… my only reason for 3 stars is the bartenders are horrible at being able to stop personal conversation and leave after serving regular guest and tend to new entering customers, they don’t greet you when walking in or even sitting down at a table. The Gay bartender is always extremely rude and makes it very clear he doesn’t take well people with chocolate colored skin.

originalText.text: wow Wanted to try the new brunch.  Only been offering it a few days and had a new chef today so I will cut them some slack.  The French toast was awesome and the coffee is served in a French Press which is really nice.  The combo breakfast is huge with lots of meat and eggs.  The doughnuts are made to order and hot, but they are cake doughnuts so if you prefer the light style doughnuts like Krispy Kreme you will not care for these as much.  These are great cake doughnuts, but they are cake.  Overall it was nice, but it is a bar not a breakfast place.  We will go back again for the French Toast, big combo breakfast and the French Press coffee for sure. Check out all of our reviews.  If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic.  Follow us if you like.  We had over 7 million views in 2021 and we thank you for that.  We don't get paid, we just love to eat.  Be sure to click on "RobH" at the top of this review to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food and shopping

originalText.text: I love this place!  I come here often with work friends or by myself and get the Teriyaki wings and tater tots. Their teriyaki sauce is the best around!  The service is good and the outdoor seating areas are beautiful.
